formalpara.title: Figure 4. Distribution of CDS sizes.
formalpara.para: This is the lengths of the CDS coding regions of genes from the START codon to the STOP codon (inclusive) without the introns. Data was obtained from WormBase release WS237. Each data point represents the number of CDSs in each size class in increments of 100 bp. Where there are several CDS isoforms in a gene, they are all counted.
